content: a little slouchy hat with lovely texture developed a convenient method that is worked in the round with daisy stitch it s completely seamless and really simple to knit **skill level ** intermediate **update as of november 3 2011** -uploaded version 1 11 of pdf file **please note ** this pattern is for non-profit/non-commercial personal use only currently i don t provide support for individual technical problems/difficulties with this pattern if you have any question please use forum and whatnot thank you for your understanding ※このパターンは個人利用に限り無料で利用できます。現在、このパターンのサポートはしておりません。ご質問はフォーラムなどをご利用くださいますようお願いします。
